#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
int t;
cin>> t;
while(t--)
{
 int n;
 cin>> n;
 int x , y , z ;
 cin>> x >> y >> z;

 int num = x*100 + y*10 + z;
 int i , result , j , flag =0;;

 for(i=9;i>0;i--)
 {
     if(flag==1) break;
  for(j=9;j>=0;j--)
  {
     result = i*10000 + num*10 + j;
    // cout<< " result is : " << result << endl;
    //  cout<<" result mod : " << result % n << endl;
     if(result % n == 0)
     {flag = 1 ; break;}

  }
 }
 if(i!=0)
  cout<< i+1 << " "<< j <<" "<<result/n << endl;
else cout<< i << endl;
  }}
